body.name: Furmax Office Chair Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk Chair, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Ergonomic Design: The overall design of this office chair is ergonomic, two lumbar supports on the backside of the chair back are not only for beautiful looking, when you lean in the chair, it feels comfortable like two hands are supporting your waist, with a slightly concave design on the cushion, this chair can effectively relieve the back pain that caused by long hours of sitting, this will be a very wonderful experience for your use.

Thicker Cushion & Double Comfort: Compared with other ordinary office chairs, the cushion of this office chair uses high-density elastic sponge, which is softer, thicker and more comfortable, and covered by breathable mesh cloth. The innermost layer is made of solid wood. The three-layer structure design can not only ensure stability and durability of the seat, but also double your comfort in daily work.

High-Quality Materials: In order to enhance customer’s experience when sitting in the chair, we adopt better materials to improve the comfort and stability of the chair. High-quality mesh surface with smooth texture and better breathability. The high grade of gas lift is certified by SGS, and the maximum support capacity is 240 pounds. The BIMIFA passed five-star leg base, ensures stableness and safety when sit.

Free Adjustment & 360-Degree Movement: The height of the seat can be adjusted using the handle at the right bottom of the seat, meet different heights of desks. Also, you can tilt backward to relax, switch your sitting posture, and adjust the tilting angle by twisting the tension column under the chair seat. The office chair uses smooth casters, and 360° horizontal rotation without resistance, it is quiet and the good PU material won’t hurt floor on moving.

Easy to Install: The office chair contains the screws, tool and manual for installation, no extra tools are needed. It will be a breeze to follow the installation steps and get an office chair that allows you to work comfortably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Office Chair for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: Admittedly this chair was delivered not even two hours ago, so I can't speak much about its long-term comfort or durability but here is what I can tell you about it:1) The most effortless assembly ever! It took me about 30 minutes to put this chair together but I can't say for sure because I didn't actually time myself and my need for perfectly aligned holes may have lengthened the time significantly. I did it by myself and it was a real snap to do.2) The plastic portions of the chair seem very sturdy and not flimsy like some office chairs I've had in the past. They seem like they will stand up to wear over time but that remains to be seen. The seat cushion is definitely comfier than I expected, it is firm and seems like it can easily snap back into shape after a long day of someone sitting in it.3) The backrest is perfect for me, I have a bad habit of hunching forward because my previous chair had no support or cushioning but then again, I was using a wooden chair. The lower lumbar support is very nice as it keeps me from hunching over at my desk by instead, encouraging me to lean back and give my spine a break. I have the reclining knob set to its furthest capability to help with this.4) This may not be the office chair for tall people or anyone seeking to be higher up but I find it suitable for me. At its highest position, the heels of my feet are less than an inch off the floor and I am only 5'2" tall, so I guess it will depend on what you are looking for.5) The wheels seem like they will hold up great and while I know this is more of a pet peeve than an actual complaint about the product, I feel it is important people know that this chair DOES NOT move across low-pile carpeting very easily. If you are like me and you have wall-to-wall carpeting you may want to purchase one of those plastic floor mats or replacement wheels designed for carpeting to ensure maximum rolling capability. To me, it doesn't matter at this point because I have no real space or need to roll around in my chair except for pure amusement.6) My only REAL complaint about this office chair is the width. I honestly didn't think to pay attention to this when purchasing. I am a decently hippy woman, as in, I have some pretty damn wide hips and this chair is a little too narrow in the seat for what I would be comfortable with. This is not to say my booty doesn't fit in the chair because it does but oh boy, I can't get much wider than I am right now, or else this chair is going to charity. I measured the shortest distance between the front of the two armrests and they are 17-1/2" apart so please take that into consideration if you are a curvy woman like me.OVERALL (TLDR), this is a great chair for the price. Easy assembly, the materials appear durable and up to the task of keeping my butt comfortable on a daily basis. The lumbar support is excellent, the height adjustment is perfect as is the recline mechanism. The only two downsides are that the wheels don't glide effortlessly across my carpet and that the armrests are just a little too close for a curvy body type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service from the Company
reviews.reviewText: Bought this chair and it arrived on time, put it together excitedly b/c I had been without a desk chair for a week or so since my old one had bit the dust and was happy to be back to normal. I had it about two days and one of the castors snapped somewhere on the inside so that the wheel stayed in place but you could no longer put any weight on that particular area or the wheel would not support the chair any longer and you would lean enough to fall out easily if you were not ready to catch yourself. I was well within my return period but did not want to go through the hassle of dismantling, repackaging and sending the chair back, and this was mandatory for both of my return options which were a replacement chair or a refund of my money. So, I reached out to the seller via Amazon with fingers crossed and explained the situation and provided them with some photos of the damage. They responded VERY quickly and agreed to my request to just send me a replacement castor so I could replace the broken one. As I had hoped, they did not just send one castor either but a sleeve of five just like you receive when you purchase a chair initially. They also shipped them out quickly and provided me with tracking information. So with minimal back and forth they were very helpful and efficient with correcting my issue, I appreciate their customer service very much. The chair itself is exactly what you would expect from a $40 chair, it could be more comfortable and ergonomic and this and that but it is now stable, provides decent back support and raises/lowers easily. Plus, I have four extra wheels now in case the overall quality of them proves to be an ongoing issues. I have had the chair over a month now though since I received the replacement wheels and have had no further issues whatsoever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Ergonomics Combined – Furmax Mid Back Swivel Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: Certainly! Here's a sample product review for the Furmax Office Chair Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk Chair:Title: Comfort and Ergonomics Combined – Furmax Mid Back Swivel Office ChairI recently upgraded my office chair to the Furmax Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk Chair, and I must say it has significantly improved my work-from-home experience. This chair seamlessly combines comfort, style, and ergonomic features.Ergonomic Design (5/5):The ergonomic design of the Furmax office chair is a game-changer for prolonged periods of sitting. The mid-back support and lumbar support provide excellent spine alignment, reducing fatigue and promoting a comfortable sitting posture. The chair is thoughtfully designed to minimize the risk of back strain during long work sessions.Breathable Mesh Material (5/5):The use of breathable mesh material enhances the overall comfort of the chair. It allows for adequate air circulation, preventing heat buildup during extended periods of sitting. The mesh backrest keeps me cool and comfortable, even during warmer days, making it an ideal choice for year-round use.Adjustability (4.5/5):The Furmax office chair offers a decent level of adjustability to cater to individual preferences. The swivel feature, adjustable height, and tilt mechanism provide flexibility for finding the optimal sitting position. While additional adjustments like adjustable armrests could enhance customization, the existing features are effective for most users.Sturdy Construction (5/5):The chair's construction is sturdy and durable. The metal base and quality materials used in its assembly give it a robust feel. The chair feels stable, and the wheels provide smooth mobility across various floor surfaces. The durability of the construction instills confidence in its long-term use.Modern Aesthetic (5/5):The Furmax office chair doesn't compromise on style. Its modern and sleek aesthetic adds a touch of sophistication to my home office. The clean lines and neutral color make it a versatile choice that complements various office decor styles.Easy Assembly (5/5):Putting the Furmax office chair together was a breeze. The assembly instructions were clear, and all the necessary tools were provided. Within a short time, I had a fully functional and stylish office chair ready for use.Lumbar Support (5/5):The lumbar support of this chair is a standout feature. It provides just the right amount of support to the lower back, reducing strain and promoting a healthy sitting posture. The lumbar support is adjustable, allowing me to customize it to my specific comfort needs.Affordability (5/5):Considering the comfort, features, and quality construction, the Furmax Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk Chair offers excellent value for money. It provides a budget-friendly option for those seeking a reliable and ergonomic office chair without breaking the bank.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Furmax Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk Chair has exceeded my expectations. Its ergonomic design, breathable mesh material, and sturdy construction make it a top-notch choice for anyone in need of a comfortable and stylish office chair. Whether for work or study, this chair provides the support and functionality necessary for long hours of seated tasks.

Honestly for the price it does its job, it beats a lot of other chairs for the price. It supports my posture for the most part. I would say it is a bit hard to sit on at first but as time went on you adjust to it. Additionally make sure you tighten the screws properly and try to line up as best as you can, set up is quick however make sure you adjust the screws properly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Issues with delivery, through no fault of Ancatech - Follow up was outstanding!
reviews.reviewText: Chair as promised - easy to assemble and very comfortable.Had an issue with delivery - Canada Post stated that they tried to deliver, but really they just make you go to the post office.I explained issue to customer service and was pleased with the follow up and the request for information on what courier is best to use in my area.
La compré al inicio de la pandemia para el home office y me ha funcionado muy bien.

Seat is advertised as 20"x20" but actually measures 19.25" wide and just 18.5" where the armrests connect, and the armrests angle inward to only 16.75" apart at their top edges. Our intended main user of this chair is 5'10", 215 lbs, and his thighs press against the armrests. It cannot be assembled sans armrests as they structurally support the back.The lumbar supports are good but low, being most pronounced at 3" to 5" above the seat, and make contact at the top of the hips if you try to sit back in the seat. The seatback slopes rearwards and makes basically no contact with you at points above the lumbar area unless you arch way back.The seat is firm and not very thick, and the recline tension can be increased just enough for a person of this weight. Recline can be locked only in the full upright position, and even when locked the chair still rocks back an inch or so.Seat height adjusts from about 17.5" to about 21". Materials overall are attractive; arms and back frame are a matte textured plastic which feels like it'll scratch easy. The fabric is a medium red that's bright without being garish.Assembly is easy if you pay attention to the three different screw lengths and make sure to use each one where it's called for.Overall an attractive lightweight office chair probably quite suitable for a smaller person. Not a chair for wide-bottomed manspreaders. Should not be represented as especially ergonomic or larger than average.
